Bird.name: chim den
Bird.desc: Name: Passy. A passerine is any bird of the order Passeriformes, which includes more than half of all bird species.

Bird.name: DieuHauVang
Bird.desc: Name: Aquila. He is a golden eagle, is one of the best-known birds of prey in the Northern Hemisphere.

Bird.name: DaibangDauTrang
Bird.desc: Name: Hally. He is a bald eagle, is a bird of prey found in North America.

Bird.name: ChimTim
Bird.desc: Name: Cinny. The violet-backed starling, is a relatively small species of starling in the Sturnidae.

Bird.name: VetThuong
Bird.desc: Name: Toco. The toco toucan, is the largest and probably the best known species in the toucan family.

Bird.name: ChimXanhDuong
Bird.desc: Name: Cyano. The blue jay, is a passerine bird in the family Corvidae, native to North America.

Bird.name: GaLoiVang
Bird.desc: Name: Mongosant. He is from North East Turkestan and adjacent Mongolia.
